English:
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Chinese: 呼……呼啊——呼啊——
Korean: 쿨―……커어어어어어어어어―…크어어어어―
German:
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...

English: Nanimon is snoring loudly as he sleeps...
Chinese: 亞伯獸正在睡覺，發出陣陣鼾聲……
Korean: 모야몬은 크게 코를 골며 자고 있다…
German: Nanimon schnarcht laut beim Schlafen ...

English: Switch off the TV?
Chinese: 要關掉電視嗎？
Korean: TV의 전원을 끄겠습니까?
German: Den Fernseher ausschalten?

English:
Yes.
No.
Chinese:
是
否
Korean:
네
아니오
German:
Ja.
Nein.

English:
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Chinese: 呼……呼啊——呼啊——
Korean: 쿨―……커어어어어어어어어―…크어어어어―
German:
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...

English: Heeeeeyyyy!!!
Korean: 어이이잇!!!
German: Heeeeee!

English:
What the hell do you think you're doing turning
off the TV like that!? I was watching that!
Chinese:
你幹嘛隨便關掉電視！
我還在看耶！！
Korean:
뭘 멋대로 TV 끄는 거야, 이자식!
지금 보고 있었다고!!
German:
Was fällt dir ein, einfach so den Fernseher
auszuschalten?! Ich habe das geguckt!

English:
Didn't your parents ever teach you not to go
traipsing into other people's houses and switching
off their TVs, huh? What's the matter with you!?
Chinese:
你爸媽教你亂闖別人家
還可以隨便亂關別人家的電視嗎！？
給我說清楚！？
Korean:
넌 다른 사람 집에 마구 들어가서
멋대로 TV를 끄면 안된다고
부모님한테 배우지 못했냐!? 대답해봐!?
German:
Haben deine Eltern dir nicht beigebracht, dass man
nicht in die Häuser anderer Leute geht und
deren Fernseher abstellt?!

English:
...If I had known you were going to give me such a
long sermon I would have apologized sooner.
Chinese: 感覺它要說教很久，所以還是及早道歉了事。
Korean: ……설교가 길어질 것 같아 빨리 사과하기로 했다
German:
... Wenn ich gewusst hätte, dass du so eine lange
Moralpredigt hältst, hätte ich mich gleich
entschuldigt.

English:
Well, if you apologize I suppose I can forgive
you... Let's start over.
Chinese:
算了，只要你肯反省，我可以原諒你。
話說回來……我好像有委託你跑腿。
Korean:
뭐어, 반성한다면 용서해줄게
그렇군… 네게는 심부름 의뢰를 했었지
German:
Nun ja, wenn du dich entschuldigst, kann ich dir
wohl vergeben ... Schwamm drüber.

English:
...Newspaper! I need a newspaper!
Go buy me one somewhere!
Chinese: 報紙！　快去給我買報紙回來！
Korean: ……신문이다! 어딘가에서 신문을 사와!
German:
... Zeitung! Ich brauche eine Zeitung!
Kauf mir irgendwo eine!

English:
Newspaper, I need a newspaper!
Quick, go out and buy me one! They're probably
selling them in Shinjuku or somewhere!
Chinese:
報紙、我要報紙！
快點去給我買回來！！
新宿那邊就有賣了吧！
Korean:
신문이다, 신문!
빨리 어딘가에서 사와!!
신주쿠 같은 곳에 가면 팔잖아!
German:
Zeitung, ich brauche eine Zeitung!
Schnell, geh los und kauf mir eine! In Shinjuku
oder anderswo gibt es sicher welche!

English: What should I do...hmm...
Chinese: 該怎麼辦呢……
Korean: 어쩔까…
German: Was soll ich tun ... Hmmm ...

English:
Hey, you over there! I have some extra newspapers.
Wanna buy 'em?
Chinese:
啊！　那邊那一位！
要不要買剩下的報紙？
Korean:
아! 잠깐 거기 당신!
남는 신문을 사지 않을래?
German:
He, du da! Ich habe ein paar Zeitungen
übrig. Willst du die kaufen?

English:
Looks like I have one newspaper left over from my
delivery. I'll give it to you for 100 yen, how
about that?
Chinese:
我好像多拿了一些出來，
結果送完報紙還有剩。
算你100YEN就好！
Korean:
일부를 여분으로 가져온 듯해서
배송이 끝나고 남아서 말이야―
100YEN이면 돼!
German:
Ich habe eine Zeitung vom Austragen übrig.
Ich gebe sie dir für 100 Yen.
Was meinst du?

English: Buy newspaper for 100 yen?
Chinese: 要花100YEN買報紙嗎？
Korean: 100YEN으로 신문을 사겠습니까?
German: Zeitung für 100 Yen kaufen?

English:
Yes.
No.
Chinese:
是
否
Korean:
네
아니오
German:
Ja.
Nein.

English:
What, you don't wanna buy it?
Okay, no prob, I'll just sell it to someone else
then...
Chinese:
咦，你不買嗎？
那就算了，我會賣給別人的……
Korean:
어―, 안 사는 거야?
그럼 됐어. 다른 녀석에게 팔 거니까…
German:
Was, du willst sie nicht kaufen?
Na gut, kein Problem. Dann verkaufe ich sie
jemand anderem ...

English: Great, have a nice day!
Chinese: 嘿嘿，多謝惠顧！
Korean: 헤헷, 감사합니다―!
German: Super. Einen schönen Tag noch!

English:
What?
Jeez, you're a total bum!
Chinese:
喂喂喂，
你到底有多窮啊……
Korean:
이게 아니라, 어이어이
너 얼마나 가난한 거야…
German:
Was?
Mann, du bist ja ganz abgebrannt!

English:
I suppose I can help you out if you're so poor...
I think was being a bit harsh with you. Right,
from tomorrow on I'll try harder!
Chinese:
總覺得好可憐……這個就當作我送你的吧。
從明天起再繼續加油哦。
Korean:
뭔가 너무 가엾기도 하니까… 이거 내가 사줄게
내일도 힘내
German:
Wenn du wirklich so arm bist, kann ich dir helfen.
Ich glaube, ich war etwas fies zu dir.
Ab morgen gebe ich mir mehr Mühe!

English: He's so selfless, I'm welling up here...
Chinese:
被鼓勵了……
報紙上的字怎麼看起來有點模糊。
Korean:
……동정받아 버렸다
신문의 글자가 어딘가 흐려져 보이는 듯한 기분이 든다
German: Er ist so selbstlos. Mir kommen die Tränen ...

English:
What is it? You still wanna buy this newspaper?
I'll sell it to you for 100 yen.
Chinese:
怎麼，你還是想要這份報紙嗎？
賣你100YEN就好。
Korean:
뭐야, 역시 이 신문을 원하는 거야?
100YEN에 팔아줄게
German:
Also? Willst du die Zeitung noch kaufen?
Ich verkaufe sie dir für 100 Yen.

English:
Phew, okay. Well that's it for today, time to go
home!
Chinese:
呼，這樣今天的份就發完了。
打道回府吧～
Korean:
후우, 이걸로 오늘 분량은 끝이군
그럼 돌아갈까―
German:
Puh, okay. Dann war es das für heute.
Feierabend!

English:
My wages aren't too bad, but still, working
mornings is a pain in the butt!
Chinese: 雖然薪水不錯，但要早起真的好累啊。
Korean: 급료가 높지만― 역시 아침은 힘드네
German:
Mein Gehalt ist nicht allzu schlecht, aber
früh morgens zu arbeiten, nervt schon!

English:
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Chinese: 呼……呼啊——呼啊——
Korean: 쿨―……커어어어어어어어어―…크어어어어―
German:
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...

English: Nanimon is snoring loudly as he sleeps...
Chinese: 亞伯獸正在睡覺，發出陣陣鼾聲……
Korean: 모야몬은 크게 코를 골며 자고 있다…
German: Nanimon schnarcht laut beim Schlafen ...

English: Switch off the TV?
Chinese: 要關掉電視嗎？
Korean: TV의 전원을 끄겠습니까?
German: Den Fernseher ausschalten?

English:
Yes.
No.
Chinese:
是
否
Korean:
네
아니오
German:
Ja.
Nein.

English:
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Chinese: 呼……呼啊——呼啊——
Korean: 쿨―……커어어어어어어어어―…크어어어어―
German:
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...

English: Heeeeeyyyy!!!
Korean: 어이이이이잇!!!
German: Heeeeee!

English:
What the hell do you think you're doing turning
off the TV like that!? I was watching that!
Chinese:
你幹嘛隨便關掉電視！
我還在看耶！！
Korean:
뭘 멋대로 TV 끄는 거야, 이자식!
지금 보고 있었다고!!
German:
Was fällt dir ein, einfach so den Fernseher
auszuschalten?! Ich habe das geguckt!

English:
...Huh? Uh, aren't you the guy I sent off on a
job? So how's it going? Did you bring me a
newspaper?
Chinese:
嗯？　喔，你是剛才被我叫去跑腿的人吧。
怎麼樣？　報紙買回來了嗎？
Korean:
……응? 아아, 넌 아까 심부름을 보낸 녀석이군
어땠어? 신문은 사왔어?
German:
... Was? Habe ich dir nicht einen
Auftrag erteilt? Wie läuft es denn?
Hast du eine Zeitung für mich?

English:
Hmm, "[i609]"? Good job!
You've got good taste in newspapers.
Chinese:
哼，是「[i609]」啊。
你挺行的嘛，有挑選報紙的眼光。
Korean:
흥,「[i609]」인가
너 꽤 하는걸. 신문을 보는 센스가 있어
German:
Hm, „[i609]“? Gut gemacht!
Du hast guten Geschmack, was
Zeitungen angeht.

English:
Huh? The money for the newspaper?
I'm not giving you that...
Chinese:
什麼？　報紙錢？
誰會還你啊。
Korean:
하? 신문대금?
그런 걸 줄 리가 있냐
German:
Was? Das Geld für die Zeitung?
Das gebe ich dir nicht ...

English:
You're getting a fee for the case, right?
So just wait for it! Jeez...
Chinese:
你不是有委託報酬嗎？用那個墊就好了吧。
總之辛苦你啦。
Korean:
너한테는 의뢰 보수가 있잖아. 그걸로 참아라
뭐, 수고했어
German:
Du wirst doch für den Fall bezahlt, nicht wahr?
Gedulde dich also einfach. Himmel ...

English: ...Ngh...nnnggghhh....
Chinese: 呼……呼啊……
German: ... Zzz ... zzZZzz ...

English:
Nanimon is asleep with the newspaper in his hand.
It's annoying when he lectures me, so I think I'll
leave him that way...
Chinese:
亞伯獸似乎拿著報紙睡著了。
要是它開始說教就麻煩了，繼續讓它睡下去好了。
Korean:
모야몬은 신문을 손에 든 채 자고 있는 듯하다
설교를 시작하면 귀찮아지므로 그대로 두기로 했다
German:
Nanimon schläft, mit der Zeitung in der Hand.
Es nervt, wenn er mich belehrt, also lasse
ich ihn so schlafen ...

English:
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Chinese: 呼……呼啊——呼啊——
Korean: 쿨―…… 커어어어어어어어어―… 크어어어어―
German:
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...

English:
Nanimon is snoring loudly while he sleeps... What
am I doing here again? Oh yeah, I'm here to solve
a case for Nanimon.
Chinese:
亞伯獸正在睡覺，發出陣陣鼾聲……
它是什麼時候來到這裡的？
對了，亞伯獸應該有發出一個委託。
Korean:
모야몬은 크게 코를 골며 자고 있다
어느새 여기 온 걸까?
그러고 보니, 모야몬의 의뢰가 있었을 것이다
German:
Nanimon schnarcht laut, während er schläft ...
Was mache ich hier noch mal? Ach ja, ich soll
einen Fall für Nanimon lösen.

English:
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Ngggghhhhh...Swioooooooo...
Chinese: 呼……呼啊——呼啊——
Korean: 쿨―…… 커어어어어어어어어―… 크어어어어―
German:
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...
ZZZzzz ... *Schnaaaaaarch* ...

English:
Nanimon is snoring loudly while he sleeps... What
am I doing here again? ...I'll leave him as he is
for the moment...
Chinese:
亞伯獸正在睡覺，發出陣陣鼾聲……
它要在這裡待到什麼時候？
總之先不要管它吧。
Korean:
모야몬은 크게 코를 골며 자고 있다
언제까지 여기에 있는 걸까?
…일단 내버려 두자
German:
Nanimon schnarcht laut, während er schläft ...
Was mache ich hier noch mal? ... Ach, ich
lasse ihn erst mal, wie er ist.
